name: Justin.tv PLAYER & CHAT [August 2009] - by BaGE87
description:
This hides everything but the player, chat frame, content status tabs, action links and stats, even the annoying meebo toolbar (the bottom toolbar).

Just a note: none of css styles will increase performance, elements are loaded but hided.
This style as been tested only in Firefox, but almost nobody who uses Internet Explorer install extensions =]

THIS STYLE WITHOUT CHAT FRAME AT: http://userstyles.org/styles/20478
